activities: We are a webhosting company that just collects information about our clients, this includes name, address, phone number, fax and email address.  We do not share this information with anyone at any time.  All information we receive including credit card details is encrypted with RC4 and crypt blowfish mechanisms.  We do not sell this information to anyone, and the information can only be accessed via https:// secure protocol.
